template:
You are an expert system diagram evaluator. Please assess the quality of the following candidate netlist descriptions generated for the attached image.

[CANDIDATES]
{candidate_answers}

For each candidate, PROVIDE AN EXPLICIT NUMERICAL SCORE BETWEEN 0-100 in the format 'Score: X' or 'Candidate #N: X/100'.

Your evaluation should focus on how accurately each description matches the actual components and connections visible in the image. Consider both the identification of components and how correctly the connections between them are captured.

After scoring all candidates, EXPLICITLY STATE which candidate is the best by writing 'Best candidate: #N'.
